programme.title: Terra Bruta, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: Pela primeira vez, o lendário John Ford une-se à estrela James Stewart em - Terra Bruta, que relata a história tensa e emocionante de dois homens da lei que invadem o território dos Comanches para resgatar reféns cativos da tribo.

programme.title: Meu Nome é Ninguém, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: O honesto advogado Black Jack Gideon envolve-se na procura de um valioso e raro pônei japonês, que foi sequestrado, e por quem o bando de desertores renegados exige uma fabulosa quantia de resgate.

programme.title: Indômita Disputa, (1979, Western)
programme.desc: Pike, Martin Sheen, é um jovem forasteiro da cidade que se vê preso e perdido em meio ao deserto oeste selvagem quando o seu amigo e caçador de peles morre.

programme.title: Bravura Indômita, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Uma garota, Mattie Ross, contrata por 100 dólares um xerife caolho e beberrão, Rooster Cogburn, para que capture o assassino de seu pai.

programme.title: Shalako, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Shalako está conduzindo uma expedição de caça em uma zona selvagem no Novo México.

programme.title: Rastros de Ódio, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmão e a família dele.

programme.title: A Marca da Forca, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoço. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e não terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: O Irresistível Forasteiro, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Um estranho em uma cidade de gado ocidental se comporta com notável autoconfiança, estabelecendo-se como um homem a ser respeitado.

programme.title: Viva Django!, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Travado e cheio de chumbo, cortesia de seu ex-amigo, o político inescrupuloso e amante do dinheiro David Barry, Django se vê vagando de uma cidade empoeirada para outra trabalhando como carrasco.

programme.title: O Prisioneiro, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Dylan deixou seu passado sombrio de crimes e encontrou o amor de sua vida, Maria. Agora ele trabalha como pescador em águas abertas, mas o diretor da prisão local tem outros planos.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: Acima Da Lei, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher pede a seu ex-marido, um advogado renomado, que defenda seu irmão criminoso, acusado de matar um promotor público.

programme.title: Original Gangster, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Conheça a diferente vida de Castor: órfão quando criança, forçado a sobreviver no deserto, até crescer e chegar a Londres, onde se tornou um dos principais chefões do submundo do crime.

programme.title: Legado de Violência, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando seu filho envolvido com negócios perigosos e pessoas de mau caráter foge, um pai se vê em meio a uma crise pessoal e familiar.

programme.title: Até o Fim da Noite, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jimmy Hill é um presidiário que recebe uma proposta irrecusável. Se conseguir pagar a dívida de um velho conhecido, poderá finalmente sair da prisão.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Após perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporação militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: O Prisioneiro, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Dylan deixou seu passado sombrio de crimes e encontrou o amor de sua vida, Maria. Agora ele trabalha como pescador em águas abertas, mas o diretor da prisão local tem outros planos.

programme.title: Meteoro: O Fim dos Tempos, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: Quando um meteoro de enorme proporção ameaça destruir a Terra, um grupo de cientistas corre contra o tempo para encontrar uma maneira de salvar a humanidade da extinção.

programme.title: Circus Kane - O Circo dos Horrores, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo é convidado para um misterioso jogo em uma casa de horrores, sob a promessa de um prêmio de 250,000 dólares para aquele que sobreviver.

programme.title: O Trevo Vermelho, (2012, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um duende malvado que foi aprisionado nas raízes de um velho carvalho é acidentalmente solto no Dia de São Patrício. Uma vez livre, ele realiza sua vingança sangrenta contra as pessoas que originalmente o aprisionaram.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Tubarões, (2012, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um grupo de completos estranhos se vê isolado por um louco rico em seu complexo na ilha. Eles são forçados a uma luva horripilante, onde devem sobreviver a uma barragem de espécies cada vez mais mortais de tubarão.

programme.title: Não Adianta Rezar, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A vida de Anna finalmente está entrando nos eixos. Traumatizada depois de um conturbado divórcio e de uma intensa luta para se livrar de sua dependência química, ela finalmente vai se mudar de vida.

programme.title: Páginas da Morte, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando um médico psiquiatra pesquisa um diário de meninas para descobrir por que ela assassinou toda a sua família, ele começa a cair no mesmo estado de insônia e confusão que a levou a perder a cabeça

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 3 Cabeças, (2015, Creature Features)
programme.desc: A maior máquina de matar do mundo é três vezes mais mortal quando um tubarão mutante ameaça um navio de cruzeiro. Os passageiros lutam contra o predador mortal usando tudo que podem encontrar.

programme.title: A Maldição do Titanic, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: 110 anos após um dos maiores desastres da história, Titanic III faz sua viagem inaugural até os destroços do navio original. Mas forças sombrias das profundezas do oceano aterrorizam os tripulantes e ameaçam repetir a história.

programme.title: Circus Kane - O Circo dos Horrores, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo é convidado para um misterioso jogo em uma casa de horrores, sob a promessa de um prêmio de 250,000 dólares para aquele que sobreviver.

programme.title: O Trevo Vermelho, (2012, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um duende malvado que foi aprisionado nas raízes de um velho carvalho é acidentalmente solto no Dia de São Patrício. Uma vez livre, ele realiza sua vingança sangrenta contra as pessoas que originalmente o aprisionaram.

programme.title: O feitiço da Casa Whaley, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Quando um guia de turismo invade a Casa Mais Assombrada dos Estados Unidos, um pouco de caça aos fantasmas amadores com amigos se transforma em mais horror do que eles jamais poderiam imaginar.

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango pararam de respirar. Inuyasha procura pelo Exército dos Sete para vingá-los. Ele vê Sesshomaru e se certifica de que é uma ilusão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se aproximam da luz de um fragmento da Jóia que parece pertencer ao Exército, mas a luz não emana energia maligna. Suikotsu, um bom médico é o dono do fragmento...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A personalidade má de Suikotsu desperta e luta contra Inuyasha. Quando as crianças o chamam para voltar a ser quem ele era, Suikotsu sente uma forte dor. Bankotsu decidiu retirar-se da vila.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Há uma barreira ao redor do Monte Hakurei que purifica os youkais ou qualquer coisa maligna. Inuyasha e os outros pensam que Narak não pode estar se escondendo no Monte e vão procurar uma pista diferente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Líder do Exército dos Sete! Bankotsu Entra em Cena

programme.title: A batalha entre Bankotsu e Inuyasha começa. Enquanto isso, Sesshomaru chega ao Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Há uma ilha sagrada em um lago cercado por névoa. Hakushin, que se tornou um Buda vivo há cem anos, é venerado lá. Mas algo estranho acontece. O pai de um garoto chamado Shintaro vai investigar, mas ele não volta.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Barreira Energética da Ilha Hijiri

programme.title: Bankotsu sequestra Agome e os outros envolvidos em sua batalha contra Inuyasha. Inuyasha está fica irritado por ver que seus amigos estão se machucando.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Topo Sagrado e o Segredo da Múmia

programme.title: A barreira sagrada de Monte Hakurei impede que os youkais entrem nele. Hakushin ajuda Narak e coloca a barreira.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Monte Hakurei fica mais forte, e Kikyo é impedida de entrar em seu solo sagrado. Kikyo deixa a aldeia de Chiyo, mas vai atrás do Bankotsu para ver o que o Exército dos Sete está fazendo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Suikotsu não pode matar Chiyo e os outros. Após isso, Suikotsu e Jakotsu vão para dentro do local sagrado e esperam por Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Ginkotsu morre e Renkotsu usa seu fragmento sem permissão. Ao fazê-lo, ele traiu Bankotsu. Ele deseja ainda mais poder e ataca Kuga para que ele possa pegar os fragmentos da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O mal dentro do Monte Hakurei são os youkais de Narak. Mirok arrisca sua vida para salvar Sango e suga todos os youkais com seu ataque junto com os insetos venenosos e entra em colapso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Mirok e Sango ficam cara a cara com a múmia de Hakushin no Monte Hakurei. O santo diz a eles o motivo de ajudar Narak.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha recupera seus poderes, derrota Jakotsu e se apressa para o Monte Hakurei. Renkotsu tem sentimentos rebeldes em relação ao Bankotsu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A barreira do Monte Hakurei desaparece e Inuyasha está preocupado com a Agome, que vai para o Monte com Kuga e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo e Sesshomaru sentiram que algo estranho aconteceu em diferentes locais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Batalha Decisiva! O Último e Mais Forte dos Guerreiros Zumbis

programme.title: Mirok e Sango veem um misterioso pedaço de carne nas profundezas do Monte Hakurei. Sesshomaru e Kikyo sentem algo estranho acontecendo em diferentes locais e seguem para o Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Poderosa Banryu; Duelo Mortal no Monte Hakurei

programme.title: Narak ganhou um novo corpo e renasceu. Inuyasha tenta derrotá-lo com seu ataque, mas ele se defende e fere Agome, Mirok e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo vê Kagura escapando do Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O Monte Hakurei é destruído e Kuga acaba caindo, mas Inuyasha o salva. Quando ele se encontra com Agome e os outros, que estão tentando escapar o mais rápido possível, ele vê uma ilusão de Kikyo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha é afastado de seus amigos quando é enganado por informações falsas de que Kikyo ainda está viva. Enquanto isso, Agome e os outros estão em uma certa cidade do castelo e são capturados.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Na Era Antiga, Narak encontra um novo youkai para procurar os fragmentos da Jóia. Enquanto isso, Agome retorna aos dias atuais e descobre que sua escola está no meio da preparação para um festival cultural.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se encontram com Shinosuke, que está procurando por sua noiva. Eles são agrupados em uma vila só de mulheres e são separados.

programme.title: A Viagem, (2012, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Uma exploração de como as ações de vidas individuais impactam umas às outras no passado, presente e futuro, como uma alma vai de assassino a herói, e um ato de bondade se espalha ao longo dos séculos para inspirar uma revolução.

programme.title: Ragnarok, (2013, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: Batalha dos Impérios, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legião de mil soldados no país e com o comandante do protetorado das Regiões Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: Guardiões do Tempo, (2020, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Uma menina tenta salvar seus pais adotivos, opondo-se às forças do mal no outro mundo de São Petersburgo.

programme.title: Crônicas da Tribo Fantasma, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Quando fósseis gigantes são descobertos perto da Mongólia, uma expedição é organizada para analisá-los. Quando uma explosão deixa os membros da equipe de escavação enterrados no subsolo, eles descobrem um templo ciclópico e bestas gigantes antigas.

programme.title: A Viagem, (2012, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Uma exploração de como as ações de vidas individuais impactam umas às outras no passado, presente e futuro, como uma alma vai de assassino a herói, e um ato de bondade se espalha ao longo dos séculos para inspirar uma revolução.

programme.title: O Mito, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: O arqueólogo Jack continua tendo sonhos recorrentes de uma vida passada, onde ele é o grande general Meng Yi, que jurou proteger uma princesa chamada Ok-Soo. Jack decide ir investigar tudo com seu amigo William.

programme.title: As Tartarugas Ninja 2: O Segredo do Ooze, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Tartarugas Ninja buscam novo lar nos esgotos de Nova York e enfrentam o Destruidor, que usa o Ooze para criar capangas. Com ajuda de April, Jordan e Keno, precisam detê-lo.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliação, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que não voltaria para a Tailândia, mas alguém o seda e o força a retornar ao país asiático.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresário em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Honra, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Dois amigos do mesmo bairro que seguiram caminhos diferentes devem decidir se ficarão do lado da lei ou das gangues quando novos confrontos começarem.

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notório criminoso chinês.

programme.title: O Dragão Invencível, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Um agente da polícia à paisana procura vingança contra um sindicato do crime implacável após o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Máscara Negra, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: O sobrevivente de um projeto para criar super soldados deve lutar contra seus ex-companheiros como um herói mascarado.

programme.title: Operation Petticoat, (1959, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A submarine captain and his supply officer are determined to get their dry-dock sub back into WWII action. However, a bevy of nurses comes aboard, causing hijinks in the hot pink sub.

programme.title: In Harm's Way, (1965, War)
programme.desc: Producer-director Otto Preminger’s epic treatment of the bombing of Pearl Harbor details the devastating attack on the Hawaiian naval base as well as the explosive, behind-the-scenes stories.

programme.title: Father Goose, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: Cary Grant stars in one of his funniest roles as a boozy beachcomber sitting out WWII in peace - until the Allies recruit him to be a lookout on the South Pacific isle.

programme.title: Strategic Air Command, (1955, War)
programme.desc: Aviation and sports come together as a baseball player is recalled to Air Force duty.

programme.title: The Pride of the Yankees, (1942, Drama)
programme.desc: The story of the life and career of famed baseball player Lou Gehrig.

programme.title: Casino Royale, (1967, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this spoof, the heads of the allied spy forces call Sir James Bond out of retirement to fight the power of SMERSH.

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: Peter Sellers and Elke Sommer star in this successful sequel to The Pink Panther in which Inspector Clouseau tries to prove a beautiful parlor maid is innocent of killing her chauffer lover.

programme.title: The Great Escape, (1963, War)
programme.desc: Steve McQueen, James Garner, and Richard Attenborough headline a stellar cast in one of the most ingenious and suspenseful adventure films of all time as a team of Allied soldiers mount a daring escape from an inescapable Nazi POW camp.

programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen, (2013, Action)

programme.title: London Has Fallen, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.

programme.title: Braveheart, (1995, Action)

programme.title: The Lazarus Effect, (2015, Horror)

programme.title: The Ruins, (2008, Teen Screams)

programme.title: Hex, (2022, Teen Screams)

programme.title: Great Teacher Onizuka
programme.desc: Eikichi brings his students on a crash course in fear.

programme.desc: Miyabi faces down an old enemy.

programme.desc: Miyabi must face off against a corrupt union to bring down Mr. Saitou.

programme.title: Great Teacher Onizuka
programme.desc: On Eikichi Onizuka's first day of teaching, he is assigned a group of challenging students.

programme.title: Great Teacher Onizuka
programme.desc: Eikichi finds himself locking horns with a pompous vice principle.

programme.title: Great Teacher Onizuka
programme.desc: Eikichi is moved to the middle school ranks, where he must work with a troubled student.

programme.title: Great Teacher Onizuka
programme.desc: Eikichi gets some lessons in the devious ways of his students.

programme.title: Great Teacher Onizuka
programme.desc: The PTA is out for Eikichi.

programme.desc: After the battle with N'doul, Kakyoin and Avdol are badly hurt, so the group heads for a hospital in Aswan. Unfortunately, dangerous enemies could be all around them even there.

programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.desc: Based on a true story, two brothers, against all the odds, come together to train for a historic title bout that has the power to reunite their fractured family and give their hard-luck town what it's been waiting for: pride.

programme.title: Swingers, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this laugh-out-loud indie comedy classic that launched the careers of its outstanding cast, two friends set out to rewrite modern dating from Los Angeles to Las Vegas.

programme.title: Pi, (2023, Thriller)
programme.desc: A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature. Pushed to his limits, he spirals between brilliance and obsession in this gripping, groundbreaking debut from Darren Aronofsky.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

programme.title: American Beauty, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: Lester's life is far from perfect. As he makes a few changes in his life, the freer and the happier he gets. However, Lester is about to learn that the ultimate freedom comes at a price.

programme.title: Citizen Ruth, (1996, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: In this outrageous satire, Laura Dern is Ruth Stoops, an irresponsible, care-free drug addict pregnant for the fifth time, horrifying everyone around her. Soon, Ruth's at the forefront of a national debate, when all she wants to do is party.

programme.title: MURIEL'S WEDDING, (1994, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: In this perfect marriage of feel-good comedy and heartfelt drama, a shy daydreamer finds the courage to leave on a tropical vacation, where she meets a wacky new friend, changes her name, and turns her world upside down, all to an ABBA soundtrack.

programme.title: Swingers, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this laugh-out-loud indie comedy classic that launched the careers of its outstanding cast, two friends set out to rewrite modern dating from Los Angeles to Las Vegas.

programme.title: American Beauty, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: Lester's life is far from perfect. As he makes a few changes in his life, the freer and the happier he gets. However, Lester is about to learn that the ultimate freedom comes at a price.

programme.title: Memento, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

programme.title: Feast, (2005, Horror)
programme.desc: Customers locked inside a bar are forced to fight monsters.

programme.title: Talk to Me, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: When a group of friends discover how to conjure spirits with an embalmed hand, they become hooked on the new thrill, unleashing terrifying supernatural forces, in the eye-popping, nightmarish debut from filmmakers Danny & Michael Philippou.

programme.title: Hereditary, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: When the matriarch of the Graham family passes away, her daughter (Toni Collette) and grandchildren begin to unravel cryptic and increasingly terrifying secrets about their ancestry, trying to outrun the sinister fate they have inherited.

programme.title: Hell House LLC., (2016, Horror)
programme.desc: Five years after an unexplained malfunction causes the death of 15 tour-goers and staff on the opening night of a Halloween haunted house tour, a documentary crew travels back to the scene of the tragedy to find out what really happened.

programme.title: V/H/S, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: This is a point-of-view, found-footage horror film from the America's top genre filmmakers. A group of misfits are hired to burglarize a house and acquire a rare tape. They are confronted with a dead body, old televisions and a supply of cryptic footage.

programme.title: V/H/S/2, (2013, Horror)
programme.desc: From the innovative minds that brought you last year's V/H/S comes V/H/S/2, an all-new anthology of dread, madness, and gore.

programme.title: V/H/S: Viral, (2015, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: A deranged truck driver has received the audience of many teens. These teens video with cameras and cell phones to catch the next viral video. However, they are the stars of the next big viral video - one where they face their own horrifying deaths.

programme.title: Vampire's Kiss, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Teetering on the edge of sanity, volatile literary agent Peter Loew (Nicolas Cage) tries to find purpose in his life through a cutthroat work ethic and a hedonistic nightlife.

programme.title: Valley Girl, (1983, Romance)
programme.desc: When Valley Girl Julie (Deborah Foreman) dumps her preppy boyfriend, she unexpectedly finds love with rocker Randy (Nicolas Cage)...much to the dismay of her valley girlfriends who find Julie's punk hunk to be "grody to the max!" Fer Shure.

programme.title: Three Amigos!, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: Steve Martin, Chevy Chase and Martin Short are three wild and crazy caballeros in this comedy adventure that’s a fiesta of fun. Co-starring Phil Hartman and Jon Lovitz, the '¡Three Amigos!' blaze a side-splitting trail across the comedy frontier!

programme.title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: The south of France. Two rival con men -- one is suave and sophisticated, the other is a third-rate American hustler -- make a wager.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil, (1989, Drama)
programme.desc: It was murder! The blind guy couldn't see it. The deaf guy couldn't hear it. But now they're both wanted for it in the drop-dead comedy that reunites the outrageous comedy duo Richard Pryor and Gene Wilder. Rating: R

programme.title: Running Scared, (1967, Action)
programme.desc: Lots of laughs and a great camaraderie is the recipe for two street-wise cops that have decided to quit the force and open a bar.

programme.title: Real Men, (1987, Comedy)

programme.title: Throw Momma From the Train, (1987, Comedy)

programme.desc: Chris Vaughn, a retired soldier who returns to his hometown only to discover the place he grew up is now overrun with crime, drugs and violence. Enlisting the help of his old pal, Chris gets elected Sheriff and fights to clean up his hometown.

programme.title: State of Grace, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: In this neo-noir crime film, an undercover cop (Sean Penn) comes back to his old neighborhood in New York City's Hell's Kitchen to bring down the Irish Mafia, which is now led by two of his childhood friends (Gary Oldman and Ed Harris).

programme.title: The Arrival, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Radio astronomer Zane Zaminsky believes he has picked up a cosmic noise that signals extraterrestrial intelligence. His desperate search for answers leads him to discover that aliens are already on Earth and in the process of preparing to take it over.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A., (1996, Action)
programme.desc: The man with the patch is back. Call him Snake. His job: wade through L.A.’s ruined landmarks to retrieve a doomsday device, with a wild assortment of friends, fiends and foes.

programme.title: Stargate, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When an ancient Egyptian artifact is discovered, two men unlock its secret power as a portal through time and space.

programme.title: Timecop, (1994, Action)

programme.title: No Escape, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: A soldier convicted of murdering his commanding officer is dumped on a prison island and left to fend for himself.

programme.title: Freejack, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Bounty hunters from the future transport a doomed race car driver to New York City in 2009, where his mind will be replaced with that of a dead billionaire.

programme.title: Ghost In The Shell, (1995, Anime)
programme.desc: 2029 – A female government cyber agent and the Internal Bureau of Investigations are hot on the trail of a "The Puppet Master" – a computer virus capable of invading cybernetic brains and altering its victim’s memory.

programme.desc: "Supernova" chronicles the search and rescue patrol of a deep space medical ship and its six-member crew.

programme.title: Tank Girl, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: In this laugh-a-minute, futuristic thriller, a mega-villain controls the world's water supply, and it's up to Tank Girl and her outrageous cohorts to end his greedy reign.

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Famous detective Hercule Poirot is on the Orient Express, but the train is caught in the snow. When one of the passengers is discovered murdered, Poirot immediately starts investigating.

programme.desc: Jake Gittes, a private eye, uncovers a web of personal and political scandals while he is hired by a beautiful socialite to investigate her husband's extra marital affair.

programme.desc: A group of allied commandos on a mission against the 3rd Reich has orders to blow a giant dam in order to crush a strategic bridge held by the Nazis.

programme.desc: With an all-star cast that includes Sean Connery, Anthony Hopkins, Laurence Olivier, Gene Hackman and Robert Redford, this epic WW II drama recreates Operation Market Garden, an ambitious plan to hasten the end of WW II that ended in disaster.

programme.desc: Jake Gittes, a private eye, uncovers a web of personal and political scandals while he is hired by a beautiful socialite to investigate her husband's extra marital affair.

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Famous detective Hercule Poirot is on the Orient Express, but the train is caught in the snow. When one of the passengers is discovered murdered, Poirot immediately starts investigating.

programme.title: The Call of the Wild, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: 1898, Alaska: John Thornton and his partner, Pete, make deliveries to mining outposts using a sled-dog team led by Buck, a prized sled dog that is targeted by crooked prospectors. Over time, Buck is increasingly drawn to life in the wild.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Ruffled Feathers
programme.desc: The race for entry into the World Duel Carnival sees Nistro clash with TV superhero The Sparrow.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Family Leave
programme.desc: Trey makes an unexpected visit to Yuma’s house and discovers the secret behind Yuma’s incredible dueling skills.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sky's the Limit
programme.desc: After accepting Trey’s challenge to a duel, Yuma soon learns that Trey has acquired a dark and dangerous new power.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Exit: Astral
programme.desc: With the bond between Astral and Yuma broken, Trey takes aim at the rest of Yuma’s life points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Crestfallen
programme.desc: The back-and-forth battle between Trey and Yuma reaches its climactic conclusion! Can Yuma defeat Trey without Astral’s assistance or will Trey triumph, leaving Yuma one Heart Piece short of making it to the finals?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Party Panic
programme.desc: Yuma and his friends get all decked out for the event of the year - the World Duel Carnival Finals party! But when Yuma forgets his invite, can he find a way into the festivities, or will he be forced to hit the road and head home early?!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Roller Duel!
programme.desc: It’s time for the World Duel Carnival Finals! But prepare for a world of twists and turns because the finalists will be dueling on a roller coaster! Can Yuma handle the ups and downs of the competition, or will he be sent for a loop?!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Roller Coaster Rampage!
programme.desc: To assess Yuma’s dueling skills, Vetrix hires the Triad of Terror, a trio of cunning card sharks, to triple team him! Yuma better figure out a way to roll through this threesome before his dueling goes off the rails!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Test Your Luck!
programme.desc: The World Duel Carnival takes a dark turn as the finalists descend into the Dragon’s Den – a dark and dangerous duel track that will bring defeat for many a duelist!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: The heat's on when Vetrix and Dextra duel in the jungle to decide who moves on to the World Duel Carnival semifinals!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Portal of Doom
programme.desc: Quinton takes a timeout during his duel against Kite to reveal the long-hidden mystery about Yuma’s father’s disappearance!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Cosmic Chaos
programme.desc: Quinton and Kite’s confrontation in the cosmos comes to a climactic conclusion!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Depths of Darkness
programme.desc: Shark finally faces off with his archenemy, Quattro! Will Shark get his long awaited revenge, or will he end up sleeping with the fishes?!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Swimming with Sharks
programme.desc: It’s the cataclysmic conclusion between Shark and Quattro! If Shark doesn’t make a comeback from the depths of defeat, not only is he out of the tournament, but his quest for justice will go unserved!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Rockin’ and Rollin’
programme.desc: There’s chaos in the canyon when Yuma duels Nistro to see who will get the last spot in the World Duel Carnival semifinals! Can Yuma dodge defeat in the desert, or is Nistro destined to rock Yuma's world?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Doctor Visit
programme.desc: When Yuma’s deck goes missing, he and the gang set out to look for it! But when their search leads them to Heartland City, they end up finding much more than they bargained for!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Duel of Destiny: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma sets his sights on reeling in Shark in the first battle of the semifinals, but when his foe starts off dueling like a guppy, Yuma questions if he’s being baited! Does Yuma learn this far too late to escape a sinister Shark attack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Duel of Destiny: Part 2
programme.desc: This is it! Yuma’s jaw-dropping duel against Shark in the World Duel Carnival semifinals draws to a finish! Can Yuma rise above his razor-sharp rival, or will he be dragged down to the depths of defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Hart of the Matter
programme.desc: The mighty masked duelist Vetrix faces off against the Number Hunter Kite! Unfortunately for Kite, Vetrix springs a shocking surprise that makes dueling all but impossible!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Change of Hart
programme.desc: The explosive end to the battle between Kite and Vetrix roars to a finish! As the battle climaxes, Yuma sets out to free Kite’s brother Hart from Vetrix’s grasp, while Kite duels knowing full well that Hart’s safety hangs in the balance!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sphere of Fear: Part 1
programme.desc: It all comes down to this! Yuma squares off against Vetrix in a battle that will determine the first ever World Duel Carnival Champion!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sphere of Fear: Part 2
programme.desc: As the duel between Vetrix and Yuma races to its cataclysmic conclusion, Yuma stares down defeat and comes face-to-face with Vetrix’s shocking secret!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sphere of Fear: Part 3
programme.desc: This is it! The earth-shattering ending of Yuma’s duel against Vetrix! Can Yuma rise above Vetrix’s unrelenting onslaught, or will he meet defeat and lose everything he holds dear – his soul, his Numbers and… Astral?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Countdown Begins
programme.desc: Yuma learns the details of Dr. Faker’s diabolical plan to destroy Astral World! Can Yuma figure out a way to stop Faker, or is the future of Astral World a thing of the past?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Trio’s Challenge: Part 1
programme.desc: Kite, Shark and Yuma join forces to take down Dr. Faker! Can this trio work together as a team and put an end to Faker’s fury, or will Faker and his deck prove to be too much of a challenge for these three fearless friends?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Trio’s Challenge: Part 2
programme.desc: With the fate of Astral World hanging in the balance, Yuma, Kite and Shark set their sights on stopping Dr. Faker, but before our three heroes can make their final move, Dr. Faker reveals the shocking reason behind his diabolical plan!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Trio’s Challenge: Part 3
programme.desc: When a mysterious being from Barian World appears, Yuma, Kite and Shark must work together and battle like never before if they want to save Hart, Astral World… and themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Kite’s Plight: Part 1
programme.desc: The stage is set for the ultimate battle between Yuma and Kite, but just when Yuma’s about to high five the sky, Kite brings him crashing down to earth with a startling revelation!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Kite’s Plight: Part 2
programme.desc: The back and forth battle between Kite and Yuma comes to an exciting conclusion that leaves one of our duelists down for the count! Will Yuma’s dream of pulling out a victory become a reality, or is Kite going to turn this dream into a nightmare?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Attack of the Barians: Part 1
programme.desc: The Barian invasion begins! Yuma faces a dangerous new enemy who will go to any extreme to gain possession of Yuma’s Numbers in order to destroy Astral and his home!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Attack of the Barians: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma’s battle with a dangerous and powerful soldier of Barian World continues as he strives to keep Astral safe! Can Yuma beat this Barian enemy and his new Chaos Monster, or will Yuma end up losing what is most valuable to him… Astral?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Hard Knox
programme.desc: When pro duelist Devon Knox teaches a special class, Yuma gets taken to the school of hard knocks and learns a valuable lesson about the Barians he won’t soon forget!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Rule Duel
programme.desc: Ray nominates Yuma to run against Caswell for the position of Class Representative, but when the Ray Way takes a turn for the worse, Yuma finds himself facing off against a Student Council President who’s been corrupted by the Barians!

programme.title: Nami's plan to save Camie goes belly up when a snot-nosed Celestial Dragon outbids the Straw Hats. Luffy and Zoro make an explosive arrival at the auction house and promptly open up a deadly can of worms.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FIST EXPLODES! DESTROY THE AUCTION

programme.title: Luffy turns a mermaid auction into a pirate-style brawl when he knocks the snot out of a Celestial Dragon. With a fleet of marines out to get them, the Straw Hats will have to fight their way off the island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MAJOR PANIC! DESPERATE STRUGGLE AT THE AUCTION HOUSE

programme.title: They saved Camie from the auction block, but now the Straw Hats are surrounded by a fleet of marines. Lucky for Luffy, Eustass "Captain" Kidd and Trafalgar Law are ready to join the fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ADMIRAL KIZARU TAKES ACTION! SABAODY ARCHIPELAGO THROWN INTO CHAOS

programme.title: The Straw Hats join forces with Kidd's crew and Trafalgar's mates to make short work of the marines, but they're in for a surprise when they encounter a Warlord of the Sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BREAK THROUGH THE SIEGE! THE NAVY VS. THE THREE CAPTAINS

programme.title: Luffy and his crew duck the marines by hiding out at Rayleigh's house. While Chopper tends to Hachi, Rayleigh entertains the Straw Hats with tales of his days as first mate on Gold Roger's ship.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ROGER AND RAYLEIGH - THE KING OF THE PIRATES AND HIS RIGHT HAND MAN

programme.title: Admiral Kizaru has arrived to lead the marines on a mission to wipe out all pirates. Meanwhile, Luffy and his crew prepare for a deadly battle with one of the Warlords of the Sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: NO ESCAPE!? ADMIRAL KIZARU'S LIGHT SPEED KICK!!

programme.title: A groovy pirate belts out a tune that leaves Kizaru in pieces, but the admiral pulls himself together in time for a crushing Light Speed Kick. Luffy and Sanji try to protect the injured Zoro from a Warlord lookalike.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OVERWHELMING! THE NAVY'S FIGHTING WEAPONS, THE PACIFISTAS

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats narrowly defeat a robot that resembles one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. But before the dust settles on the field of battle, a far deadlier foe comes looking for a fight.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: AN EVEN STRONGER ENEMY APPEARS! THE BATTLE AXE-CARRYING SENTOMARU

programme.title: Zoro's barely breathing, and Admiral Kizaru is ready to stomp him into oblivion. The battered and beaten Straw Hats could certainly use a powerful friend right about now.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ADMIRAL KIZARU'S FIERCE ASSAULT / THE STRAW HATS FACE CERTAIN DEATH!

programme.title: One by one, the mighty paw-print of Bartholomew Kuma makes the Straw Hats disappear until only Luffy remains. To where did his mates vanish? And will he ever see them again?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ELIMINATED FRIENDS - THE FINAL DAY OF THE STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: Yesterday, the Straw Hats valiantly battled a Warlord of the Sea. Today, Boss Luffy and his friends at the Pinwheel Diner prepare to compete in the Great Portable Shrine Race!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FEUDAL ERA SIDE STORY / BOSS LUFFY APPEARS AGAIN

programme.title: Thriller Company sabotages the race for a sacred treasure, and the displaced Straw Hats must pull an all-nighter to rebuild their shrine and score some ancient gold!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FEUDAL ERA SIDE STORY / DEFEAT THRILLER COMPANY'S TRAP!

programme.title: Luffy finds himself stranded and starving on a strange island. The rubber-man's amazing appetite puts his manhood in danger when he devours an array of exotic mushrooms!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LANDING! THE ALL-FEMALE ISLAND, AMAZON LILY

programme.title: An army of scantily-clad women warriors want to investigate Luffy's family jewels, but the captain of the Straw Hats is more interested in reuniting with his lost mates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HURRY BACK TO YOUR FRIENDS! THE MAIDEN ISLAND ADVENTURE

programme.title: The women chasing Luffy are loyal subjects of Boa Hancock, the curvaceous Warlord of the Sea. This stone-cold beauty is deadly, and she's about to pick a fight with an entire fleet of marines!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EVERYONE FALLS IN LOVE! PIRATE EMPRESS HANCOCK

programme.title: Luffy's search for a seaworthy vessel leads to a "drop-in" on the Snake Princess during the royal bathing hour. The view is world-class, but it might turn the rubber-man to stone!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SECRET HIDDEN ON THE BACKS / LUFFY AND THE SNAKE PRINCESS MEET

programme.title: Boa Hancock makes Luffy mad when she turns Margaret into a statue. The Snake Princess may have bitten off more than she can chew by challenging the captain of the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HEARTLESS JUDGMENT! MARGARET IS TURNED TO STONE!!

programme.title: The Snake Princess pits Luffy's Gum-Gum abilities against the incredible Haki power of her serpentine sisters in a fight to the death. Will Luffy survive long enough to save his statuesque friends?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A DIFFICULT FIGHT FOR LUFFY! THE SNAKE SISTERS' HAKI POWER!!

programme.title: Luffy kicks his attack mode into Second Gear to save a precious statue, and the snake sisters start to feel the Straw Hat heat. At the battle's climax, Luffy makes an impression on his opponents.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ALL-OUT SPECIAL POWER BATTLE!! GUM-GUM VS. SNAKE-SNAKE

programme.title: News of Luffy's run-in with the Celestial Dragons impresses the Snake Princess, so she tells him the story of her tortured past. Will his honorable nature speed Luffy toward a reunion with his crew?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HANCOCK'S CONFESSION-- THE SISTERS' ABHORRENT PAST

programme.title: Luffy is mobbed by a hoard of pretty Kuja women eager to touch a real live man. Granny Nyon offers him a safe haven, but what she has to say might sink his plans for a Straw Hat reunion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SAVING ACE! THE NEXT STOP: THE GREAT PRISON

programme.title: Boa Hancock's illness threatens to sabotage Luffy's rescue mission. However, the Snake Princess just can't say "no" to the rubber-man, so a plan to save Ace is quickly hatched.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LOVE IS A HURRICANE! LOVE-LOVE HANCOCK

programme.title: While Luffy races to save Ace, Nami tries to survive life on Sky Island, and Franky dances up a snowstorm before making the switch from cola to tea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! THE SCIENCE OF WEATHER AND THE MECHANICAL ISLAND

programme.title: Chopper narrowly avoids being served for dinner in a land inhabited by giant birds, and Sanji's refined tastes land him a role as a leading lady on the island of girlish hearts.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! AN ISLAND OF GIANT BIRDS AND A PINK PARADISE!

programme.title: Nico Robin finds herself trapped on the island of Tequila Wolf: a miserable land where children are forced to work as slaves. Elsewhere, Usopp tries to survive a run-in with a man-eating plant!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! BRIDGING THE ISLANDS AND VICIOUS VEGETATION!

programme.title: Zoro is held against his will by the pink-haired princess of bad vibes, Brook gets mistaken for the king of darkness, and Luffy continues to eat his way toward a reunion with Fire-Fist Ace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! A NEGATIVE PRINCESS AND THE KING OF DEMONS!

programme.title: Luffy and Boa arrive at Impel Down, but only thirty-three hours remain until Ace's execution. To save him, the Snake Princess must find a way to hide Luffy during her full-body search!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A DEADLY INFILTRATION! THE UNDERWATER PRISON IMPEL DOWN

programme.title: Time is running out on Ace, so Luffy teams up with a scoundrel who's going to pieces trying to escape Impel Down. There's no love lost between the former foes, but they'd better work together if they want to survive.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A REUNION IN HELL?! THE MAN WHO ATE THE CHOP-CHOP FRUIT!

programme.title: Luffy must part ways with a priceless treasure map before Buggy the Clown agrees to lead him through the bloody tangle of Blade Trees and Spike Needle Grass that make up Impel Down's Crimson Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BREAK THROUGH THE CRIMSON HELL! BUGGY'S CHAOS-INDUCING PLAN

programme.title: Luffy and Buggy the Clown could end up as hippo food if they aren't careful in Impel Down's Wild Beast Hell. Of course, the rubber-man might find that a better fate than dealing with the prison's putrid warden!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRONGEST MAN IN THE PRISON! POISON MAN MAGELLAN APPEARS

programme.title: Luffy and his crew stumble upon a most peculiar village when they hitch a ride on a fire-breathing beetle. The natives are petrified of pirates, but they welcome the Straw Hats with open arms!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / A GOLD LION'S AMBITION ON THE MOVE

programme.title: The citizens of Little East Blue throw in a feast in honor of the Straw Hats, but when the Amigo Pirates try to capture Boss the Beetle, Luffy and his crew will have to defend their new friends.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / LITTLE EAST BLUE IN DANGER

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji prepare to do battle on behalf of Boss the Beetle, but Captain Largo of the Amigo Pirates counters with a deadly arsenal of nets to put the Straw Hat brawlers on lock down!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / THE FIERCE ONSLAUGHT OF THE AMIGO PIRATES

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Vampires)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Source Code, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars in this action thriller about a man who awakens in another man’s body to discover only he has the ability to stop a terrorist attack on a commuter train.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Vampires)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Action)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Return Of The Seven, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: Guns Of The Magnificent Seven, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: In this thrilling follow-up to one of the greatest Western sagas in film history, notorious desperado Chris Adams (George Kennedy) is offered a huge reward to free a young Mexican revolutionary from prison…in the midst of the Mexican Revolution.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: Silver Canyon, (1951, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry and Pat Buttram are sent by the cavalry to bring in raiders who are interfering with supply lines. Gene traces them to a small Army outpost where the outlaws set out to ravage the town.

programme.title: Zorro, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: In the New World, a new Spanish governor finds the province of Nueva Aragón under the iron fist of the corrupt Colonel Huerta and vows to bring justice under the guise of a masked avenger.

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: World Trade Center, (2006, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage and Michael Peña star as two New York City Port Authority policemen who were trapped in the rubble of September 11, 2001.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Posing as Elvis impersonators, ex-convicts rob a Las Vegas casino during an Elvis Presley fan convention, but greed and dissention among them ultimately lead to betrayal and chaos.

programme.title: Into the Blue, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Young vacationers, expecting to have a memorable time diving, find themselves in deep trouble with a druglord when they come upon the illicit cargo of a sunken airplane.

programme.title: Crank, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Today is the last day of hit man Chev Chelios' life. He has been given a poison that will kill him if he allows his heart to settle into a normal rhythm. In order to stay alive and take revenge, Chev must keep his adrenaline elevated by any way possible.

programme.title: Crank 2 High Voltage, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: In this high-octane sequel, hitman Chev Chelios (Statham) launches himself on an electrifying chase through Los Angeles in pursuit of the Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart.

programme.title: War, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: A full-throttle, martial arts thriller, WAR stars Jet Li and Jason Statham as two adversaries set on a violent collision course in the Asian mob underground.

programme.title: The Way of the Gun, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A pair of bumbling criminals kidnap a woman for ransom money, but they soon realize they've made a huge mistake when they learn she is a surrogate for a ruthless mob boss.

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Continuing his crusade to punish violent criminals in America, former FBI agent Frank Castle arrives in New York to take on a scarred villain who plots to take control of the underworld.

programme.title: Crank, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Today is the last day of hit man Chev Chelios' life. He has been given a poison that will kill him if he allows his heart to settle into a normal rhythm. In order to stay alive and take revenge, Chev must keep his adrenaline elevated by any way possible.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa is curious to know why Pegasus is reluctant to tell her where he came from. When she confronts Pegasus with the question, he disappears.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Palla-Pall turns Sailor Chibi Moon into an adult and Sailor Moon into a child. Chibi-Usa turns into shock when Pegasus can no longer hear her.
programme.sub-title: Pegasus's Secret: The Boy Who Protects the Dream World

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls begin to suspect that Chibi-Usa is in love. Eager to know who the boy is, they try to get Chibi-Usa to talk, but with little success.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends help set up the stage for the Coming of Age Day ceremony. They befriend four girls who are actually the Amazoness Quartet.
programme.sub-title: Dream to be an Adult: The Amazoness' Confusion

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Strange spider webs begin to appear all across the Juban District. The girls notice that these webs are all originating from the Dead Moon Circus.
programme.sub-title: Terror in Motion: The Dark Queen's Evil Hand

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nehelenia sets her plan in motion by starting a solar eclipse that will leave the world in eternal darkness.
programme.sub-title: The Source of Darkness: Dead Moon Circus

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Dead Moon discovers that Sailor Chibi Moon was hiding Pegasus and captures her. Sailor Chibi Moon learns the history behind the Dead Moon's queen.
programme.sub-title: Labyrinth of Mirrors: Chibi Moon Captured

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nehelenia demands that Helios give up the Golden Crystal in exchange for Sailor Chibi Moon. The Sailor Guardians are struggling to defeat Zirconia.
programme.sub-title: The Golden Crystal Appears: Nehalennia's Magic

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nehelenia regains her full power and proceeds to put the world into an eternal slumber.Sailor Moon tries to activate the power of the Golden Crystal.
programme.sub-title: When the Crystal Shines: The Beautiful Power of Dreams

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Golden Crystal’s power defeats Nehelenia, pushing her back into the abyss. Nehelenia tries to take Sailor Chibi Moon with her.
programme.sub-title: Dreams Forever: Fill the Heavens with Light

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends start their new lives as high school girls. Nehalennia breaks out of her prison to seek revenge against the Sailor Guardians.
programme.sub-title: The Flower of Nightmares Scatters: The Queen of Darkness Returns

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Hotaru starts to age at an accelerated rate, from a baby to a young girl within days. She warns of coming danger that will soon befall Sailor Moon.
programme.sub-title: Saturn Awakens: The Ten Sailor Guardians Unite

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The city is being plagued by a strange illness that causes people to become obsessed with staring into the mirror for hours, even days.
programme.sub-title: The Cursed Mirror: Mamoru Caught in a Nightmare

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon is left devastated after seeing Mamoru get abducted To make matters worse, Nehalennia’s action is starting to cause a time paradox.
programme.sub-title: Night of Destiny: The Sailor Guardians' Ordeals

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon runs off to save Mamoru from Nehalennia. The rest of the Sailor Guardians try to go after her, but they fall victim to Nehalennia’s traps.
programme.sub-title: For Love: The Endless Battle in the Dark World

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Chibi Moon and Sailor Saturn make it to Nehalennia’s palace, where Mamoru is being held prisoner. The two Guardians are unable to free him.
programme.sub-title: Moon Power of Love: The Nightmare Ends

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru tells Usagi that he’s accepted an offer to study abroad in the U.S., which will force them to have a long-distance relationship.
programme.sub-title: Farewells and Encounters: The Transitioning Stars of Destiny

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi runs into Seiya and is annoyed by his cocky attitude. The next day, Seiya and the rest of Three Lights have transferred to her school.
programme.sub-title: A School Storm: The Transfer Students Are Idols

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako decides to work for the Three Lights as their personal assistant. But Minako soon realizes that being a star is not all fun and glamor.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Three Lights are rehearsing for their upcoming musical. But they seem to have a hard time winning the approval of the stage director.
programme.sub-title: Fighter's Secret Identity: The Shocking Super Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami invites Taiki to come and watch the Wataru’s Comet pass by Earth with their science teacher Amanogawa, only to be rejected.
programme.sub-title: A Star of Dreams and Wishes: Taiki's Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls are searching for Luna, who has gone missing. To their surprise, they find Luna being introduced on TV as Yaten’s pet cat.
programme.sub-title: Luna's Discovery: The Real Face of Yaten

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Taiki asks Makoto to appear on a cooking show with him. Usagi decides to tag along, but her clumsiness creates a huge mess at the TV studio.
programme.sub-title: Friend or Foe? Star Lights and the Sailor Guardians

programme.title: Guerra Biológica, (1998)
programme.desc: 1998. Um imunologista da CIA se aposenta e vai morar com sua filha numa cidadezinha distante. Quando um miliciano detona uma bomba biológica na região, cabe ao ex-agente evitar o pior e salvar as vidas de todos. Gêneros: Sci-Fi & Fantasy Elenco: Steven Seagal, Gailard Sartain, L.Q. Jones, Silas Weir Mitchell, Camilla Belle, Dan Beene, Damon Collazo, Whitney Yellow Robe, Brad Leland, Molly McClure Diretor: Dean Semler

programme.title: Guerra nas ruas, (1969)
programme.desc: 1969. O passado de Black Ops de Kane está causando incerteza no futuro da equipe SIU. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal, Sarah Lind Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: Redenção, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. Jason Statham é um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grávida. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Agata Buzek, Jason Statham Diretor: Steven Knight

programme.title: O Franco-Atirador, (2015)
programme.desc: 2015. Depois de uma longa carreira como matador de aluguel, Martin Terrier pretende se aposentar e passar o resto da vida ao lado de sua amada. Mas ele descobre que está sendo traído por pessoas de sua confiança! Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Sean Penn, Jasmine Trinca, Javier Bardem Diretor: Pierre Morel

programme.title: O Grande Dave, (2008)
programme.desc: 2008. Tripulação de aliens em miniatura opera uma nave espacial com forma humana. Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: Eddie Murphy, Elizabeth Banks, Judah Friedlander, Marc Blucas, Gabrielle Union, Scott Caan, Pat Kilbane, Ed Helms, Kevin Hart, Mike O'Malley Diretor: Brian Robbins

programme.title: Assassin's Creed, (2016)
programme.desc: 2016. Callum Lynch explora as memórias de seu ancestral Aguilar Nerha e se torna um Mestre Assassino para enfrentar a sociedade secreta dos Templários. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Michael Fassbender, Marion Cotillard, Jeremy Irons, Brendan Gleeson, Charlotte Rampling Diretor: Justin Kurzel

programme.title: Alvo Duplo, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Dois caras durões e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vão unir forças para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa não será nada fácil e muito sangue vai rolar. Gêneros: Crime Elenco: Christian, Slater, Stallone, Sylvester Diretor: Walter Hill

programme.title: Sobreviva a Noite, (2019)
programme.desc: 2019. Um intenso filme de ação, que traz Dolph Lundgren como um agente da Interpol protegendo sua esposa e filha de um criminoso implacável e seus mercenários em um vilarejo italiano. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Dolph Lundgren, Hal Yamanouchi, Natalie Burn, Ralph Palka, Mario Opinato, Brice Martinet, Andrea Scarduzio Diretor: Giorgio Bruno

programme.title: Ameaça Explosiva, (2016)
programme.desc: 2016. Depois de uma ameaça de bomba, dois especialistas do FBI mergulham em um jogo mortal de gato e rato com um criminoso, correndo desesperadamente contra o tempo para descobrir o verdadeiro objetivo do homem-bomba, enquanto lutam para salvar sua cidade. programme.title: Honra, (2006)

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995)
programme.desc: 1995. Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família. programme.desc: 2007. Linda Hanson é uma mulher suburbana que um dia é avisada que seu marido, Jim, morreu em um terrível desastre automobilístico. Uma jovem problemática que trabalha em um call center de orações faz a diferença na vida de outras pessoas, o que a faz lidar com seu passado conturbado quando finalmente um dia percebe a fé. Gêneros: Drama Elenco: Brittany Snow, William H. Macy, Tom Lipinski Diretor: Maggie Kiley

programme.title: A Árvore Da Vida, (2011)
programme.desc: 2011. A história de uma família em Waco, Texas, em 1956. O filho mais velho testemunha a perda da inocência e luta com os ensinamentos conflitantes de seus pais. Gêneros: Drama Elenco: Brad Pitt, Jessica Chastain, Hunter McCracken, Sean Penn Diretor: Terrence Malick

programme.title: O Melhor Ladrão do Mundo, (2005)
programme.desc: 2005. Depois que o marido tem um derrame, Sue Zaidman passa a ser a única provedora de sua família. Ela enfrenta uma fase difícil e turbulenta, e tem que se impor para lidar com os filhos e manter-se firme apesar das adversidades. Gêneros: Drama Elenco: Mary-Louise Parker, Michael Silverman, David Warshofsky Diretor: Jacob Kornbluth

programme.title: Prisioneiras Nunca Mais, (2021)
programme.desc: 2021. Inspirada em acontecimentos reais, Prisioneiras Nunca Mais conta a história de Aggie, em busca de suas duas afilhadas, sequestradas pelo pai para serem vendidas como escravas. O filme é um drama sobre a realidade do tráfico humano. Gêneros: Thriller Elenco: Madison De La Garza, Kevin Sorbo, Cynthia Gibb Diretor: Lisa Arnold

programme.title: Betty e Coretta, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. Estrelando Mary J. Blige e Angela Bassett. Coretta Scott King e a Dra. Betty Shabazz, esposas do Dr. Martin Luther King e de Malcolm X, devem continuar suas vidas como mães solteiras após o assassinato de seus maridos. Gêneros: Drama Elenco: Tyler Hynes, Angela Bassett, Gloria Reuben Diretor: Yves Simoneau

programme.title: Poder Além da Vida, (2006)
programme.desc: 2006. Dan Millman é um atleta que tem dinheiro, mulheres perseguindo-o e aptidões para participar das Olimpíadas. Mas um encontro com Sócrates, um homem que questiona tudo, faz sua visão de mundo mudar completamente. Gêneros: Drama Elenco: Scott Mechlowicz, Nick Nolte, Amy Smart, Tim DeKay, Ashton Holmes, Paul Wesley, Agnes Bruckner, B.J. Britt, Tom Tarantini, Beatrice Rosen Diretor: Victor Salva

programme.title: O Amor Nunca Morre, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. Depois de anos afastado dos amigos e familiares, produtor musical com a vida pessoal e profissional em frangalhos volta para casa na Carolina do Norte para cuidar do pai doente, num difícil reencontro com questões do passado. Gêneros: Drama Elenco: Ryan Kwanten, Mischa Barton, Beau Bridges, Ja Rule, Fran Kranz, Jennifer Sterger, Bianca Lawson, Cicero Salmon III, Charles Porter, Gabriel Mann Diretor: Luke Kasdan

programme.title: À Procura da Liberdade, (2021)
programme.desc: 2021. Dois homens separados por 100 anos estão unidos em sua busca pela liberdade. Em 1856, um escravo, Samuel Woodward e sua família, escapam da Plantação Monroe perto de Richmond, Virgínia. Gêneros: Drama Elenco: Cuba Gooding Jr., Sharon Leal, David Rasche Diretor: Peter Cousens

programme.title: A Recruta Hollywood, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Mega Valentine é uma estrela de cinema à beira da falência. Quando vê a chance de estrelar em um filme baseado no serviço militar, decide alistar-se no Exército para convencer o produtor da obra de que ela é a atriz ideal para o papel principal. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Três Ladrões e um Bebê, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O compulsivo jogador Slipper vê o sequestro do neto de um magnata a salvação de suas dívidas. Quando, junto com seu senhorio e o oportunista Octopus, sequestra BB, sem saber, frustram os planos do crime organizado, que também está atrás da criança. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Agente Mirim, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Quando sua mãe viaja, Olívia fica sob os cuidados do seu irmão mais velho, Miles. Quando Olivia testemunha um sequestro, ninguém acredita nela, nem mesmo seu irmão. Determinada a provar seu valor, a pequena decide investigar o crime por si só. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Nezha - Correndo pela Vida, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. A equipe Lions de Fórmula 1 perde seu o principal piloto e coloca em seu lugar o campeão do simulador de corrida Du Jieke. Com um oponente forte e conflitos a resolver, a equipe enfrenta uma batalha feroz. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Deus Não Está Morto - Uma Luz na Escuridão, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um incêndio atinge a Igreja de Saint James, devastando a congregação e o Pastor Dave, e a universidade vizinha usa a tragédia para tentar despejar a congregação de seu campus. Dave recorre a seu irmão, um advogado ateu, para tentar reerguer a igreja. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: The King's Avatar - Pela Glória, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Uma equipe de gamers é patrocinada para participar de sua primeira competição nacional de Glory. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Ruas em Guerra, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um veterano de guerra tenta ajudar um garoto e seu irmão mais novo quando eles se envolvem com um viciado em drogas e sua gangue. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Lobo Guerreiro 2, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um ex-agente das forças especiais da China leva uma vida pacata no litoral da África. Mas sua tranquilidade é abalada quando mercenários começam a atacar a população. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Transmissões Sinistras, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. No final dos anos 90, um arquivista de vídeo desenterra uma série de transmissões piratas sinistras e fica obcecado em descobrir a conspiração sombria por trás delas. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Condução Perigosa, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Simon Keller, um misterioso ladrão, planeja roubar um banco e obriga um antigo piloto de corrida a dirigir o carro de fuga. Após o roubo, eles enfrentam policiais e mafiosos em uma alucinante perseguição na costa da Austrália. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Deixados para Trás II - Comando Tribulação, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Após o desaparecimento de milhões de pessoas, o mundo, em desespero, recorre ao presidente das Nações Unidas. Mas um grupo distante dali, chamado Comando Tribulação, tenta alertar a todos sobre a verdadeira e sinistra identidade do governante. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Robo-Dog, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O cãozinho de Tyler sofre uma morte trágica, deixando o garoto extremamente entristecido. Usando uma superbateria, Tom, o pai de Tyler, cria um cão-robô para o filho. O problema é que o chefe de Tom está disposto a tudo para obter a superbateria. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.desc: 1970. Uma família de policiais sofre um verdadeiro colapso moral. Isso porque dois irmãos, sufocados pela sombra do pai, o ex-chefe de polícia, precisam investigar um crime que eles próprios cometeram. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: A Família, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Fred Blake, um ex-mafioso, precisa se mudar para a França, junto de sua família, após entrar para o programa de proteção à testemunhas. De início, eles se adaptam à nova vida, mas aos poucos os velhos hábitos voltam à tona. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.desc: 1970. Após passar 12 anos na prisão, o famoso arrombador de cofres Dom Hemingway volta para as ruas de Londres em busca da sua recompensa por ter ficado de boca fechada durante todo esse tempo. Ao lado do amigo Dickie, ele faz uma visita ao chefe do crime. Gêneros: Entertainment

Agora, a polícia está atrás dos responsáveis, e isso faz com que Kyle se arrependa. Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: Matt Stone, Mona Marshall, Trey Parker Diretor: Trey Parker
programme.desc: South Park - T07E03

programme.title: 2003. Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer". Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: Matt Stone, Mona Marshall, Trey Parker Diretor: Trey Parker
programme.desc: South Park - T07E11

programme.title: 2005. Após passar por uma operação para mudar de sexo, o senhor Garrison finalmente se sente como uma verdadeira mulher. Enquanto isso, Kyle quer fazer uma cirurgia para ficar negro e assim, conseguir ser aceito pelo time de basquete. Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: April Stewart, Matt Stone, Mona Marshall, Trey Parker Diretor: Matt Stone, Trey Parker
programme.sub-title: A Nova Vagina Chique do Professor Garrison
programme.desc: South Park - T09E01
